item.title: New Static Site with Hugo
item.author: shadowimmage@gmail.com (Chase Sawyer)
item.description: Built a new site, leaving Jekyll for Hugo, for my github.io page. Changes Moved all my old Jekyll files to a new subdirectory in order to maintain access to the old code and posts, and then transition all the content over to the main Hugo site as settings come together. One major advantage of Hugo is that the build process is super fast, so I’ve been looking at how to integrate CircleCI with Hugo builds.
